ValidationRule.description: Ensures that any testing accounts use the designated testing email account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Test_Record__c && NOT( ISBLANK( PersonEmail ) ) && NOT( BEGINS(PersonEmail, "owemailtest2108+") ) && CONTAINS(PersonEmail, "@gmail.com") && NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.OW_user_type__c,"Integration"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sorry but as this is a testing account, we limit the ability to specify your own choice of email address. Talk to Ant or Cian if you're unsure about why this is.
